name: Extreme Violence (itch)
description:
EXTREME VIOLENCE!

A remake of a classic multi player top down 2D shooter.

Join your friends (or enemies) in on of several arenas and see who can get the most wins! Features multiple arenas, weapons, power ups, gore, and lighting effects.

2-6 players multiplayer (and a single player training mode). Can be played with a keyboard or game pad. Only for Windows at the moment.
